 29751                                  ; 28/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 29752                                  ; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - offset 43BDh
 29753                                  
 29754                                  ;Break	<CheckThisDevice - Check for being a device>
 29755                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29756                                  ;
 29757                                  ;   CheckThisDevice - Examine the area at DS:SI to see if there is a valid
 29758                                  ;   device specified. We will return carry if there is a device present. 
 29759                                  ;   The forms of devices we will recognize are:
 29760                                  ;
 29761                                  ;	[path]device
 29762                                  ;
 29763                                  ;   Note that the drive letter has *already* been removed. All other forms
 29764                                  ;   are not considered to be devices. If such a device is found we change
 29765                                  ;   the source pointer to point to the device component.
 29766                                  ;
 29767                                  ;   Inputs:	ES is DOSDATA
 29768                                  ;		DS:SI contains name
 29769                                  ;   Outputs:	ES is DOSDATA
 29770                                  ;		DS:SI point to name or device
 29771                                  ;		Carry flag set if device was found
 29772                                  ;		Carry flag reset otherwise
 29773                                  ;   Registers Modified: all except ES:DI, DS
 29774                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29775                                  
 29776                                  CheckThisDevice:
 29777 00004D00 57                      	push	di
 29778 00004D01 56                      	push	si
 29779 00004D02 89F7                    	MOV	DI,SI
 29780                                  
 29781                                  ; Check for presence of \dev\ (Dam multiplan!)
 29782                                  
 29783 00004D04 8A04                    	MOV	AL,[SI]
 29784 00004D06 E8330D                  	call	PATHCHRCMP		; is it a path char?
 29785 00004D09 7517                    	JNZ	short ParseDev		; no, go attempt to parse device
 29786 00004D0B 46                      	INC	SI			; simulate LODSB
 29787                                  
 29788                                  ; We have the leading path separator. Look for DEV part.
 29789                                  
 29790 00004D0C AD                      	LODSW
 29791 00004D0D 0D2020                  	OR	AX,2020h
 29792 00004D10 3D6465                  	cmp	ax,"de"
 29793                                  	;CMP	AX,"e"<< 8 + "d"
 29794 00004D13 752D                    	JNZ	short NotDevice		; not "de", assume not device
 29795 00004D15 AC                      	LODSB
 29796 00004D16 0C20                    	OR	AL,20h
 29797 00004D18 3C76                    	CMP	AL,"v"                  ; Not "v", assume not device
 29798 00004D1A 7526                    	JNZ	short NotDevice
 29799 00004D1C AC                      	LODSB
 29800 00004D1D E81C0D                  	call	PATHCHRCMP		; do we have the last path separator?
 29801 00004D20 7520                    	JNZ	short NotDevice		; no. go for it.
 29802                                  
 29803                                  ; DS:SI now points to a potential drive. Preserve them as NameTrans advances
 29804                                  ; SI and DevName may destroy DS.
 29805                                  
 29806                                  ParseDev:
 29807 00004D22 1E                      	push	ds
 29808 00004D23 56                      	push	si			; preserve the source pointer
 29809 00004D24 E8590C                  	call	NameTrans		; advance DS:SI
 29810 00004D27 803C00                  	CMP	BYTE [SI],0		; parse entire string?
 29811 00004D2A F9                      	STC				; simulate a Carry return from DevName
 29812 00004D2B 750B                    	JNZ	short SkipSearch	; no parse. simulate a file return.
 29813                                  
 29814                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 29815 00004D2D 16                      	push	ss
 29816 00004D2E 1F                      	pop	ds
 29817                                  
 29818                                  ; M026 - start - fix ported from ROMDOS2 for bug # 2849
 29819                                  ;
 29820                                  ; SR;
 29821                                  ; We have to set Attrib before invoking DevName. Otherwise, the value from
 29822                                  ; a previous DOS call is used and DevName thinks it is not a device if the
 29823                                  ; old call set the volume attribute bit.
 29824                                  
 29825 00004D2F A0[6D05]                	mov	al,[SATTRIB]
 29826 00004D32 A2[6B05]                	mov	[ATTRIB],al		;set Attrib for DevName
 29827                                  
 29828                                  ; M026 - end
 29829                                  
 29830 00004D35 E86FFE                  	call	DEVNAME
 29831                                  
 29832                                  SkipSearch:
 29833 00004D38 5E                      	pop	si
 29834 00004D39 1F                      	pop	ds
 29835                                  
 29836                                  ; SI points to the beginning of the potential device. If we have a device
 29837                                  ; then we do not change SI. If we have a file, then we reset SI back to the
 29838                                  ; original value. At this point Carry set indicates FILE.
 29839                                  
 29840                                  CheckReturn:
 29841 00004D3A 5F                      	pop	di			; get original SI
 29842 00004D3B 7302                    	JNC	short Check_Done	; if device then do not reset pointer
 29843 00004D3D 89FE                    	MOV	SI,DI
 29844                                  Check_Done:
 29845 00004D3F 5F                      	pop	di
 29846 00004D40 F5                      	CMC				; invert carry. Carry => device
 29847 00004D41 C3                      	retn
 29848                                  NotDevice:
 29849 00004D42 F9                      	STC
 29850 00004D43 EBF5                    	JMP	short CheckReturn

 29901                                  ;Break	<IOFUNC -- DO FUNCTION 1-12 I/O>
 29902                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29903                                  ;
 29904                                  ; Procedure Name : IOFUNC
 29905                                  ;
 29906                                  ; Inputs:
 29907                                  ;	DS:SI Points to SFT
 29908                                  ;	AH is function code
 29909                                  ;		= 0 Input
 29910                                  ;		= 1 Input Status
 29911                                  ;		= 2 Output
 29912                                  ;		= 3 Output Status
 29913                                  ;		= 4 Flush
 29914                                  ;		= 5 Input Status - System WAIT invoked for K09 if no char
 29915                                  ;				   present.
 29916                                  ;	AL = character if output
 29917                                  ; Function:
 29918                                  ;	Perform indicated I/O to device or file
 29919                                  ; Outputs:
 29920                                  ;	AL is character if input
 29921                                  ;	If a status call
 29922                                  ;		zero set if not ready
 29923                                  ;		zero reset if ready (character in AL for input status)
 29924                                  ; For regular files:
 29925                                  ;	Input Status
 29926                                  ;		Gets character but restores position
 29927                                  ;		Zero set on EOF
 29928                                  ;	Input
 29929                                  ;		Gets character advances position
 29930                                  ;		Returns ^Z on EOF
 29931                                  ;	Output Status
 29932                                  ;		Always ready
 29933                                  ; AX altered, all other registers preserved
 29934                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 30612                                  ; 30/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30613                                  ; DOSCODE:86A8h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 30614                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 30615                                  ; DOSCODE:866Dh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 30616                                  
 30617                                  ;Break	<RW_SC -- Read Write Secondary Cache>
 30618                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30619                                  ;
 30620                                  ; Procedure Name : RW_SC
 30621                                  ;
 30622                                  ; Inputs:
 30623                                  ;	 [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= secondary cache count
 30624                                  ;	 [SC_STATUS]= SC validity status
 30625                                  ;	 [SEQ_SECTOR]= last sector read
 30626                                  ; Function:
 30627                                  ;	Read from or write through secondary cache
 30628                                  ; Output:
 30629                                  ;	ES:BX Points to DEVCALL
 30630                                  ;	carry clear, I/O is not done
 30631                                  ;		     [SC_FLAG]=1 if continuos sectors will be read
 30632                                  ;	carry set, I/O is done
 30633                                  ;
 30634                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30635                                  
 30636                                  RW_SC:
 30637                                  	; SS override for all variables used.
 30638                                  	
 30639                                  	CMP	word [ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT],0  ;AN000;LB. secondary cache exists?
 30640                                  	JZ	short scexit4		    ;AN000;LB. no, do nothing
 30641                                  	CMP	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;LB. sector count = 1 (buffer I/O)
 30642                                  	JNZ	short scexit4 		    ;AN000;LB. no, do nothing
 30643                                  	PUSH	CX			    ;AN000;LB.
 30644                                  	PUSH	DX			    ;AN000;LB. yes
 30645                                  	PUSH	DS			    ;AN000;LB. save registers
 30646                                  	PUSH	SI			    ;AN000;LB.
 30647                                  	PUSH	ES			    ;AN000;LB.
 30648                                  	PUSH	DI			    ;AN000;LB.
 30649                                  
 30650                                  	MOV	DX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB. starting sector
 30651                                  	CMP	BYTE [ss:DEVCALL_REQFUNC],DEVRD ;AN000;LB. read ?
 30652                                  	JZ	short doread		    ;AN000;LB. yes
 30653                                  	CALL	INVALIDATE_SC		    ;AN000;LB. invalidate SC
 30654                                  	JMP	scexit2 		    ;AN000;LB. back to normal
 30655                                  scexit4:				    ;AN000;
 30656                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. I/O not done yet
 30657                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB.
 30658                                  doread: 				    ;AN000;
 30659                                  	CALL	SC2BUF			    ;AN000;LB. check if in SC
 30660                                  	JC	short readSC		    ;AN000;LB.
 30661                                  	MOV	word [ss:DEVCALL_REQSTAT],STDON ;AN000;LB. fake done and ok
 30662                                  	STC				    ;AN000;LB. set carry
 30663                                  	JMP	short saveseq 		    ;AN000;LB. save seq. sector #
 30664                                  readSC: 				    ;AN000;
 30665                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]   	    ;AN000;LB. subtract sector num from
 30666                                  	MOV	CX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB. saved sequential sector
 30667                                  	SUB	CX,[ss:SEQ_SECTOR]    	    ;AN000;LB. number
 30668                                  	SBB	AX,[ss:SEQ_SECTOR+2]  	    ;AN000;LB.
 30669                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30670                                  	;CMP	AX,0			    ;AN000;LB. greater than 64K
 30671                                  	JNZ	short saveseq2		    ;AN000;LB. yes,save seq. sector #
 30672                                  chklow: 						
 30673                                  	CMP	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. <= 1
 30674                                  	JA	short saveseq2		    ;AN000;LB. no, not sequential
 30675                                  	MOV	word [ss:SC_STATUS],-1	    ;AN000;LB. presume all SC valid
 30676                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT]	    ;AN000;LB. yes, sequential
 30677                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLSCNT],AX	    ;AN000;LB. read continuous sectors
 30678                                  readsr:
 30679                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLXAD+2]	    ;AN000;LB. save buffer addr
 30680                                  	MOV	[ss:TEMP_VAR2],AX	    ;AN000;LB. in temp vars
 30681                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLXAD]	    	    ;AN000;LB.
 30682                                  	MOV	[ss:TEMP_VAR],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 30683                                  
 30684                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR]	    ;AN000;LB. use SC cache addr as
 30685                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD],AX		    ;AN000;LB. transfer addr
 30686                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR+2]	    ;AN000;LB.
 30687                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD+2],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 30688                                  	MOV	byte [ss:SC_FLAG],1	    ;AN000;LB. flag it for later;
 30689                                  	MOV	AL,[ss:SC_DRIVE]	    ;AN000;LB. current drive
 30690                                  	MOV	[ss:CurSC_DRIVE],AL	    ;AN000;LB. set current drive
 30691                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB. current sector
 30692                                  	MOV	[ss:CurSC_SECTOR],AX	    ;AN000;LB. set current sector
 30693                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	    ;AN000;LB.
 30694                                  	MOV	[ss:CurSC_SECTOR+2],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 30695                                  saveseq2:				    ;AN000;
 30696                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. clear carry
 30697                                  saveseq:				    ;AN000;	
 30698                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	    ;AN000;LB. save current sector #
 30699                                  	MOV	[ss:SEQ_SECTOR+2],AX	    ;AN000;LB. for access mode ref.
 30700                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB.	
 30701                                  	MOV	[ss:SEQ_SECTOR],AX 	    ;AN000;LB.	
 30702                                  	JMP	short scexit 		    ;AN000;LB.	
 30703                                  scexit2:				    ;AN000;LB.
 30704                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB.	clear carry
 30705                                  scexit: 				    ;AN000;		
 30706                                  	POP	DI			    ;AN000;LB.
 30707                                  	POP	ES			    ;AN000;LB. restore registers
 30708                                  	POP	SI			    ;AN000;LB.
 30709                                  	POP	DS			    ;AN000;LB.
 30710                                  	POP	DX			    ;AN000;LB.
 30711                                  	POP	CX			    ;AN000;LB.
 30712                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB.
 30713                                  
 30714                                  ;Break	<IN_SC -- check if in secondary cache>
 30715                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30716                                  ;
 30717                                  ; Procedure Name : IN_SC
 30718                                  ;
 30719                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_DRIVE]= requesting drive
 30720                                  ;	   [CURSC_DRIVE]= current SC drive
 30721                                  ;	   [CURSC_SECTOR]= starting scetor # of SC
 30722                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= SC count
 30723                                  ;	   [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX= sector number
 30724                                  ; Function:
 30725                                  ;	Check if the sector is in secondary cache
 30726                                  ; Output:
 30727                                  ;	carry clear, in SC
 30728                                  ;	   CX= the index in the secondary cache
 30729                                  ;	carry set, not in SC
 30730                                  ;
 30731                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30732                                  
 30733                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 30734                                  IN_SC:
 30735                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 30736                                  	MOV	AL,[ss:SC_DRIVE]	    ;AN000;;LB. current drive
 30737                                  	CMP	AL,[ss:CurSC_DRIVE]	    ;AN000;;LB. same as SC drive
 30738                                  	JNZ	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 30739                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	    ;AN000;;LB. subtract sector num from
 30740                                  	MOV	CX,DX			    ;AN000;;LB. secondary starting sector
 30741                                  	SUB	CX,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR]        ;AN000;;LB. number
 30742                                  	SBB	AX,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR+2]      ;AN000;;LB.
 30743                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30744                                  	;CMP	AX,0			    ;AN000;;LB. greater than 64K
 30745                                  	JNZ	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 30746                                  	CMP	CX,[ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT]	    ;AN000;;LB. greater than SC count
 30747                                  	JAE	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 30748                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;;LB. clear carry
 30749                                  	;JMP	short inexit		    ;AN000;;LB. in SC
 30750                                  	; 16/12/2022
 30751                                  	retn	; 30/04/2019
 30752                                  	; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 30753                                  	;jmp	short inexit
 30754                                  
 30755                                  outrange2:				    ;AN000;;LB. set carry
 30756                                  	STC				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30757                                  inexit: 				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30758                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30759                                  
 30760                                  ;Break	<INVALIDATE_SC - invalide secondary cache>
 30761                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30762                                  ;
 30763                                  ; Procedure Name : Invalidate_Sc
 30764                                  ;
 30765                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_DRIVE]= requesting drive
 30766                                  ;	   [CURSC_DRIVE]= current SC drive
 30767                                  ;	   [CURSC_SECTOR]= starting scetor # of SC
 30768                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= SC count
 30769                                  ;	   [SC_STATUS]= SC status word
 30770                                  ;	   [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX= sector number
 30771                                  ;
 30772                                  ; Function:
 30773                                  ;	invalidate secondary cache if in there
 30774                                  ; Output:
 30775                                  ;	[SC_STATUS] is updated
 30776                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30777                                  
 30778                                  INVALIDATE_SC:
 30779                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 30780                                  
 30781                                  	CALL	IN_SC			    ;AN000;;LB. in secondary cache
 30782                                  	JC	short outrange		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 30783                                  	MOV	AX,1			    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate the sector
 30784                                  	SHL	AX,CL			    ;AN000;;LB. in the secondary cache
 30785                                  	NOT	AX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30786                                  	AND	[ss:SC_STATUS],AX	    ;AN000;;LB. save the status
 30787                                  outrange:				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30788                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.

 30790                                  ; DOSCODE:87A5h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 30791                                  ; 22/11/2022
 30792                                  ; DOSCODE:876Ah (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 30793                                  
 30794                                  ;Break	<VIRREAD- virtually read data into buffer>
 30795                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30796                                  ;
 30797                                  ; Procedure Name : SC_FLAG
 30798                                  ;
 30799                                  ; Inputs:  SC_FLAG = 0, no sectors were read into SC
 30800                                  ;		     1, continuous sectors were read into SC
 30801                                  ; Function:
 30802                                  ;	   Move data from SC to buffer
 30803                                  ; Output:
 30804                                  ;	 carry clear, data is moved to buffer
 30805                                  ;	 carry set, bad sector or exceeds maximum sector
 30806                                  ;	   SC_FLAG =0
 30807                                  ;	   CALLSCNT=1
 30808                                  ;	   SC_STATUS= -1 if succeeded
 30809                                  ;     
 30810                                  ;		       0 if failed
 30811                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30812                                  
 30813                                  VIRREAD:
 30814                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 30815                                  
 30816                                  	CMP	byte [ss:SC_FLAG],0	    ;AN000;;LB. from SC fill
 30817                                  	JZ	short sc2end		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 30818                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:TEMP_VAR2]	    ;AN000;;LB. restore buffer addr
 30819                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD+2],AX	    ;AN000;;LB.
 30820                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:TEMP_VAR]	    ;AN000;;LB.
 30821                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD],AX		    ;AN000;;LB.
 30822                                  	MOV	byte [ss:SC_FLAG],0	    ;AN000;;LB. reset sc_flag
 30823                                  	MOV	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;;LB. one sector transferred
 30824                                  
 30825                                  	;TEST	word [SS:DEVCALL_REQSTAT],STERR ;AN000;;LB. error?
 30826                                  	test	byte [ss:DEVCALL_REQSTAT+1],(STERR>>8) ; 80h
 30827                                  	JNZ	short scerror 		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 30828                                  	PUSH	DS			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30829                                  	PUSH	SI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30830                                  	PUSH	ES			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30831                                  	PUSH	DI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30832                                  	PUSH	DX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30833                                  	PUSH	CX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30834                                  	XOR	CX,CX			    ;AN000;;LB. we want first sector in SC
 30835                                  	CALL	SC2BUF2 		    ;AN000;;LB. move data from SC to buf
 30836                                  	POP	CX
 30837                                  	POP	DX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30838                                  	POP	DI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30839                                  	POP	ES			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30840                                  	POP	SI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30841                                  	POP	DS			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30842                                  	JMP	SHORT sc2end		    ;AN000;;LB. return
 30843                                  scerror:				    ;AN000;
 30844                                  	MOV	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;;LB. reset sector count to 1
 30845                                  	MOV	word [ss:SC_STATUS],0	    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate all SC sectors
 30846                                  	MOV	byte [ss:CurSC_DRIVE],-1    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate drive
 30847                                  	STC				    ;AN000;;LB. carry set
 30848                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30849                                  sc2end: 				    ;AN000;
 30850                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;;LB. carry clear
 30851                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30852                                  
 30853                                  ; 30/04/2019 - Retro  DOS v4.0
 30854                                  ; DOSCODE:87FDh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 30855                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 30856                                  ; DOSCODE:87C2h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 30857                                  
 30858                                  ;Break	<SC2BUF- move data from SC to buffer>
 30859                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30860                                  ;
 30861                                  ; Procedure Name : SC2BUF
 30862                                  ;
 30863                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_STATUS] = SC validity status
 30864                                  ;	   [SC_SECTOR_SIZE] = request sector size
 30865                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_PTR] = pointer to SC
 30866                                  ; Function:
 30867                                  ;	   Move data from SC to buffer
 30868                                  ; Output:
 30869                                  ;	   carry clear, in SC  and data is moved
 30870                                  ;	   carry set, not in SC and data is not moved
 30871                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30872                                  
 30873                                  SC2BUF:
 30874                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 30875                                  	CALL	IN_SC			    ;AN000;LB. in secondary cache
 30876                                  	;JC	short noSC		    ;AN000;LB. no
 30877                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30878                                  	jc	short sexit
 30879                                  	MOV	AX,1			    ;AN000;LB. check if valid sector
 30880                                  	SHL	AX,CL			    ;AN000;LB. in the secondary cache
 30881                                  	TEST	[ss:SC_STATUS],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 30882                                  	JZ	short noSC		    ;AN000;LB. invalid
 30883                                  ;entry SC2BUF2
 30884                                  SC2BUF2:				    ;AN000;
 30885                                  	;MOV	AX,CX			    ;AN000;LB. times index with
 30886                                  	;MUL	word [ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]    ;AN000;LB. sector size
 30887                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30888                                  	mov	ax,[ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]
 30889                                  	xchg	ax,cx ; cx = [ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]
 30890                                  	mul	cx
 30891                                  	ADD	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR]	    ;AN000;LB. add SC starting addr
 30892                                  	ADC	DX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR+2]	    ;AN000;LB.
 30893                                  	MOV	DS,DX			    ;AN000;LB. DS:SI-> SC sector addr
 30894                                  	MOV	SI,AX			    ;AN000;LB.
 30895                                  	MOV	ES,[ss:CALLXAD+2]		    ;AN000;LB. ES:DI-> buffer addr
 30896                                  	MOV	DI,[ss:CALLXAD]		    ;AN000;LB.
 30897                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30898                                  	;MOV	CX,[ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]	    ;AN000;LB. count= sector size
 30899                                  	SHR	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. may use DWORD move for 386
 30900                                  ;entry MOVWORDS
 30901                                  MOVWORDS:				    ;AN000;
 30902                                  	CMP	byte [ss:DDMOVE],0	    ;AN000;LB. 386 ?
 30903                                  	JZ	short nodd		    ;AN000;LB. no
 30904                                  	SHR	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. words/2
 30905                                  	DB	66H			    ;AN000;LB. use double word move
 30906                                  nodd:
 30907                                  	REP	MOVSW			    ;AN000;LB. move to buffer
 30908                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. clear carry
 30909                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB. exit
 30910                                  noSC:					    ;AN000;
 30911                                  	STC				    ;AN000;LB. set carry
 30912                                  sexit:					    ;AN000;
 30913                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB.
 30914                                  
 30915                                  %endif	; SC

 30947                                  ;Break   <BUILDDIR,NEWDIR -- ALLOCATE DIRECTORIES>
 30948                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30949                                  ;
 30950                                  ; Procedure Name : BUILDDIR,NEWDIR
 30951                                  ;
 30952                                  ; Inputs:
 30953                                  ;       ES:BP Points to DPB
 30954                                  ;       [THISSFT] Set if using NEWDIR entry point
 30955                                  ;               (used by ALLOCATE)
 30956                                  ;       [LASTENT] current last valid entry number in directory if no free
 30957                                  ;               entries
 30958                                  ;       [DIRSTART] Points to first cluster of dir (0 means root)
 30959                                  ; Function:
 30960                                  ;       Grow directory if no free entries and not root
 30961                                  ; Outputs:
 30962                                  ;       CARRY SET IF FAILURE
 30963                                  ;       ELSE
 30964                                  ;          AX entry number of new entry
 30965                                  ;          If a new dir [DIRSTART],[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM],[DIRSEC] set
 30966                                  ;               AX = first entry of new dir
 30967                                  ;       GETENT should be called to set [LASTENT]
 30968                                  ;
 30969                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30970                                  
 30971                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30972                                  ; DOSCODE:8845h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)

 30974                                  ; DOSCODE:880Ah (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)

 31127 0000507F 7302                    	JNC	short GET_SSIZE

 31129 00005082 C3                      	retn

 31136                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],4
 31137 0000508C 26804D0504              	OR	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_isDIR

 31163 0000509F E86E17                  	call	SET_BUF_DIRTY

 31168 000050A3 59                      	POP	CX

 31186                                  loop_zerodir:

 31196                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31197                                  ;
 31198                                  ; Procedure Name : SETDOTENT
 31199                                  ;
 31200                                  ; set up a . or .. directory entry for a directory.
 31201                                  ;
 31202                                  ;   Inputs:     ES:DI point to the beginning of a directory entry.
 31203                                  ;               AX contains ". " or ".."
 31204                                  ;               DX contains first cluster of entry
 31205                                  ;
 31206                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31207                                  
 31208                                  	; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31209                                  
 31210                                  SETDOTENT:
 31211                                  ;	Fill in name field
 31212 000050B2 AB                      	STOSW
 31213 000050B3 B90400                  	MOV	CX,4
 31214 000050B6 B82020                  	MOV	AX,"  " ; 2020h
 31215 000050B9 F3AB                    	REP	STOSW
 31216 000050BB AA                      	STOSB
 31217                                  
 31218                                  ;	Set up attribute
 31219                                  	;mov	al, 10h
 31220 000050BC B010                    	MOV	AL,attr_directory
 31221 000050BE AA                      	STOSB
 31222                                  
 31223                                  ;	Initialize time and date of creation
 31224                                  	;ADD	DI,10
 31225                                  	; 23/04/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31226                                  	;;;
 31227 000050BF 83C708                  	add	di,8
 31228 000050C2 A1[F20A]                	mov	ax,[CLUSTERS_HW]
 31229 000050C5 AB                      	stosw		; Set up first cluster field (hw)
 31230                                  	;;;	
 31231 000050C6 8B36[9E05]              	MOV	SI,[THISSFT]
 31232                                  	;mov	ax,[si+0Dh]
 31233 000050CA 8B440D                  	MOV	AX,[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_time]
 31234 000050CD AB                      	STOSW
 31235                                  	;mov	ax,[si+0Fh]
 31236 000050CE 8B440F                  	MOV	AX,[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_date]
 31237 000050D1 AB                      	STOSW
 31238                                  
 31239                                  ;	Set up first cluster field (lw)
 31240 000050D2 89D0                    	MOV	AX,DX
 31241 000050D4 AB                      	STOSW
 31242                                  
 31243                                  ;	0 file size
 31244                                  	;XOR	AX,AX
 31245 000050D5 91                      	xchg	ax,cx ; 23/02/2024
 31246 000050D6 AB                      	STOSW
 31247 000050D7 AB                      	STOSW
 31248 000050D8 C3                      	retn

 31250                                  ;Break   <MAKENODE -- CREATE A NEW NODE>
 31251                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31252                                  ;
 31253                                  ; Procedure Name : MakeNode
 31254                                  ;
 31255                                  ; Inputs:
 31256                                  ;       AL - attribute to create
 31257                                  ;       AH = 0 if it is ok to truncate a file already by this name
 31258                                  ;	AH != 0 if truncation not allowed (prexisting file is an error)
 31259                                  ;               (AH ignored on dirs and devices)
 31260                                  ;
 31261                                  ;        NOTE: When making a DIR or volume ID, AH need not be set since
 31262                                  ;               a name already existant is ALWAYS an error in these cases.
 31263                                  ;
 31264                                  ;       [WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 31265                                  ;               terminated)
 31266                                  ;       [CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 31267                                  ;               ( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 31268                                  ;                Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 31269                                  ;       [THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 31270                                  ;       [THISSFT] Points to an empty SFT. EXCEPT sf_mode filled in.
 31271                                  ; Function:
 31272                                  ;       Make a new node
 31273                                  ; Outputs:
 31274                                  ;       Sets EXTERR_LOCUS = errLOC_Disk or errLOC_Unk via GetPathNoset
 31275                                  ;       CARRY SET IF ERROR
 31276                                  ;          AX = 1 A node by this name exists and is a directory
 31277                                  ;          AX = 2 A new node could not be created
 31278                                  ;          AX = 3 A node by this name exists and is a disk file
 31279                                  ;               (AH was NZ on input)
 31280                                  ;          AX = 4 Bad Path
 31281                                  ;               SI return from GetPath maintained
 31282                                  ;          AX = 5 Attribute mismatch
 31283                                  ;          AX = 6 Sharing Violation
 31284                                  ;               (INT 24 generated ALWAYS since create is always compat mode
 31285                                  ;          AX = 7 file not found for Extended Open (not exists and fails)
 31286                                  ;       ELSE
 31287                                  ;          AX = 0 Disk Node
 31288                                  ;          AX = 3 Device Node (error in some cases)
 31289                                  ;          [DIRSTART],[DIRSEC],[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM] set to directory
 31290                                  ;               containing new node.
 31291                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:BX Points to entry
 31292                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:SI Points to entry.dir_first
 31293                                  ;          [THISSFT] is filled in
 31294                                  ;               sf_mode = unchanged.
 31295                                  ;          Attribute byte in entry is input AL
 31296                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 31297                                  ;
 31298                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31299                                  
 31300                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31301                                  ; DOSCODE:8925h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 31302                                  
 31303                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31304                                  ; DOSCODE:88EAh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31305                                  
 31306                                  ; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31307                                  ; DOSCODE:951Ah (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 31308                                  
 31309                                  MakeNode:
 31310                                  	;mov	word [CREATING],0E5FFh
 31311 000050D9 C706[7E05]FFE5          	MOV	WORD [CREATING],DIRFREE*256 + 0FFh ; Creating, not DEL *.*
 31312 000050DF 50                      	PUSH	AX 		; Save AH value
 31313 000050E0 C606[4C03]00            	MOV	byte [NoSetDir],0
 31314 000050E5 A2[6D05]                	MOV	[SATTRIB],AL
 31315 000050E8 E895F8                  	call	GetPathNoSet
 31316 000050EB 88CA                    	MOV	DL,CL		; Save CL info
 31317                                  	;MOV	CX,AX		; Device ID to CH
 31318                                  	; 23/02/2024
 31319 000050ED 91                      	xchg	ax,cx
 31320 000050EE 58                      	POP	AX		; Get back AH
 31321 000050EF 732D                    	JNC	short make_exists ; File existed
 31322 000050F1 7505                    	JNZ	short make_err_4 ; Path bad
 31323 000050F3 80FA80                  	CMP	DL,80h		; Check "CL" return from GETPATH
 31324 000050F6 7405                    	JZ	short make_type	; Name simply not found, and no metas
 31325                                  make_err_4:
 31326 000050F8 B004                    	MOV	AL,4		; case 1 bad path
 31327                                  make_err_ret:
 31328                                  	;XOR	AH,AH
 31329                                  	; 23/02/2024
 31330 000050FA 98                      	cbw
 31331 000050FB F9                      	STC
 31332                                  ;make_retn:	; 22/11/2022
 31333 000050FC C3                      	retn
 31334                                  
 31335                                  	;entry	RENAME_MAKE	; Used by DOS_RENAME to "copy" a node
 31336                                  RENAME_MAKE:
 31337                                  make_type:
 31338                                  ;Extended Open hooks
 31339                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 31340                                  	;TESTB	EXTOPEN_ON,EXT_OPEN_ON	;FT. from extended open		;AN000;
 31341 000050FD F606[F605]01            	test	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ; 1
 31342 00005102 7411                    	JZ	short make_type2	;FT. no				;AN000;
 31343 00005104 800E[F605]04            	OR	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_FILE_NOT_EXISTS ; 4
 31344                                  					;FT. set for extended open ;AN000;
 31345                                  	;TESTB	EXTOPEN_FLAG,0F0H	;FT. not exists and fails	;AN000;
 31346 00005109 F606[F405]F0            	test	byte [EXTOPEN_FLAG],0F0h
 31347 0000510E 7505                    	JNZ	short make_type2	;FT. no				;AN000;
 31348 00005110 F9                      	STC				;FT. set carry			;AN000;
 31349 00005111 B80700                  	MOV    AX,7			;FT. file not found		;AN000;
 31350                                  	; 22/11/2022
 31351                                  make_retn:
 31352                                  	;return
 31353 00005114 C3                      	retn				;FT.				;AN000;
 31354                                  
 31355                                  ;	Extended Open hooks
 31356                                  
 31357                                  make_type2:
 31358 00005115 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 31359 00005119 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX		; nothing exists Disk Node
 31360 0000511B F9                      	STC			; Not found
 31361 0000511C EB59                    	JMP	short make_new
 31362                                  
 31363                                  ; The node exists. It may be either a device, directory or file:
 31364                                  ;   Zero set => directory
 31365                                  ;   High bit of CH on => device
 31366                                  ;   else => file
 31367                                  
 31368                                  make_exists:
 31369 0000511E 7447                    	JZ	short make_exists_dir
 31370 00005120 B003                    	MOV	AL,3		; file exists type 3  (error or device node)
 31371                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],18h
 31372 00005122 F606[6B05]18            	TEST	byte [ATTRIB],attr_volume_id+attr_directory
 31373 00005127 753A                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret_5
 31374                                  				; Cannot already exist as Disk or Device Node
 31375                                  				;  if making DIR or Volume ID
 31376 00005129 08ED                    	OR	CH,CH
 31377 0000512B 781A                    	JS	short make_share ; No further checks on attributes if device
 31378 0000512D 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH
 31379 0000512F 75C9                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret ; truncating NOT OK (AL = 3)
 31380 00005131 51                      	PUSH	CX		; Save device ID
 31381 00005132 8E06[E405]              	MOV	ES,[CURBUF+2]
 31382                                  	;mov	ch,[es:bx+0Bh]
 31383 00005136 268A6F0B                	MOV	CH,[ES:BX+dir_entry.dir_attr] ; Get file attributes
 31384                                  	;test	ch,1

 31453                                  ; We get here by having the user FAIL a share problem. Typically a failure of

 31485 000051A5 58                      	POP	AX
 31486 000051A6 EBB6                    	jmp	short Make_Share_ret
 31487                                  
 31488                                  ; We have found an existing file. We have also entered it into the share set.
 31489                                  ; At this point we need to call newentry to correctly address the problem of
 31490                                  ; getting rid of old data (create an existing file) or creating a new
 31491                                  ; directory entry (create a new file). Unfortunately, this operation may
 31492                                  ; result in an INT 24 that the user doesn't return from, thus locking the file
 31493                                  ; irretrievably into the share set. The correct solution is for us to LEAVE
 31494                                  ; the share set now, do the operation and then reassert the share access.
 31495                                  ;
 31496                                  ; We are allowed to do this! There is no window! After all, we are in
 31497                                  ; critDisk here and for someone else to get in, they must enter critDisk also.
 31498                                  
 31499                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31500                                  	; DOSCODE:89C8h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31501                                  
 31502                                  MakeEndShare:

 31509 000051B5 57                      	push	di

 31515 000051BD 5F                      	pop	di

 31517                                  	;pop	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]

 31521 000051C4 5B                      	pop	bx
 31522 000051C5 5E                      	pop	si
 31523 000051C6 59                      	pop	cx
 31524 000051C7 58                      	pop	ax
 31525 000051C8 E8A0FF                  	CALL	make_save

 31527                                  ; If the user failed, we do not reenter into the sharing set.
 31528

 31545                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31546                                  ;
 31547                                  ; Procedure Name : NEWENTRY
 31548                                  ;
 31549                                  ; Inputs:
 31550                                  ;	  [THISSFT] set
 31551                                  ;	  [THISDPB] set
 31552                                  ;	  [LASTENT] current last valid entry number in directory if no free
 31553                                  ;		  entries
 31554                                  ;	  [VOLID] set if a volume ID was found during search
 31555                                  ;	Attrib Contains attributes for new file
 31556                                  ;	  [DIRSTART] Points to first cluster of dir (0 means root)
 31557                                  ;	  CARRY FLAG INDICATES STATUS OF SEARCH FOR FILE
 31558                                  ;		  NC means file existed (device)
 31559                                  ;		  C  means file did not exist
 31560                                  ;	  AH = Device ID byte
 31561                                  ;	  If FILE
 31562                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:BX points to start of directory entry
 31563                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:SI points to dir_first of directory entry
 31564                                  ;	  If device
 31565                                  ;	  DS:BX points to start of "fake" directory entry
 31566                                  ;	  DS:SI points to dir_first of "fake" directory entry
 31567                                  ;		  (has DWORD pointer to device header)
 31568                                  ; Function:
 31569                                  ;	  Make a new directory entry
 31570                                  ;	  If an old one existed it is truncated first
 31571                                  ; Outputs:
 31572                                  ;	  Carry set if error
 31573                                  ;		  Can't grow dir, atts didn't match, attempt to make 2nd
 31574                                  ;		  vol ID, user FAILed to I 24
 31575                                  ;	  else
 31576                                  ;		  outputs of DOOPEN
 31577                                  ; DS, BX, SI preserved (meaning on SI BX, not value), others destroyed
 31578                                  ;
 31579                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31580                                  
 31581                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31582                                  	; DOSCODE:89F9h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31583                                  
 31584                                  	; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31585                                  	; DOSCODE:961Ah (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 31586                                  
 31587                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8A34h)
 31588                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:8B7Dh)
 31589

 31732                                  ; DOOPEN
 31733                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31734                                  ;
 31735                                  ; Inputs:
 31736                                  ;	  [THISDPB] points to DPB if file
 31737                                  ;	  [THISSFT] points to SFT being used
 31738                                  ;	  AH = Device ID byte
 31739                                  ;	  If FILE
 31740                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:BX points to start of directory entry
 31741                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:SI points to dir_first of directory entry
 31742                                  ;	  If device
 31743                                  ;	  DS:BX points to start of "fake" directory entry
 31744                                  ;	  DS:SI points to dir_first of "fake" directory entry
 31745                                  ;		  (has DWORD pointer to device header)
 31746                                  ; Function:
 31747                                  ;	  Fill in SFT from dir entry
 31748                                  ; Outputs:
 31749                                  ;	  CARRY CLEAR
 31750                                  ;	  sf_ref_count and sf_mode fields not altered
 31751                                  ;	  sf_flags high byte = 0
 31752                                  ;	  sf_flags low byte = AH except
 31753                                  ;	  sf_flags Bit 6 set (not dirty or not EOF)
 31754                                  ;	  sf_attr sf_date sf_time sf_name set from entry
 31755                                  ;	  sf_position = 0
 31756                                  ;	  If device
 31757                                  ;	  sf_devptr = dword at dir_first (pointer to device header)
 31758                                  ;	  sf_size = 0
 31759                                  ;	  If file
 31760                                  ;	  sf_firclus sf_size set from entry
 31761                                  ;	  sf_devptr = [THISDPB]
 31762                                  ;	  sf_cluspos = 0
 31763                                  ;	  sf_lstclus = sf_firclus
 31764                                  ;	  sf_dirsec sf_dirpos set
 31765                                  ; DS,SI,BX preserved, others destroyed
 31766                                  ;
 31767                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31768                                  
 31769                                  	; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31770                                  	; DOSCODE:96C3h (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 31771                                  
 31772                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8AE4h)
 31773                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:8C4Ch)
 31774                                  
 31775                                  	;entry	DOOPEN
 31776                                  DOOPEN:
 31777                                  ;	Generate and store attribute
 31778

 32034                                  ;
 32035                                  ; Procedure Name : FREEENT
 32036                                  ;
 32037                                  ; Inputs:
 32038                                  ;	  ES:BP -> DPB
 32039                                  ;	  [CURBUF] Set
 32040                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:BX points to directory entry
 32041                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:SI points to above dir_first
 32042                                  ; Function:
 32043                                  ;	  Free the cluster chain for the entry if present
 32044                                  ; Outputs:
 32045                                  ;	  Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 32046                                  ;	  (NOTE dir_firclus and dir_size_l/h are wrong)
 32047                                  ; DS BX SI ES BP preserved (BX,SI in meaning, not value) others destroyed
 32048                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32049                                  
 32050                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 32051                                  	; 24/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)

 32144                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32145                                  ;
 32146                                  ; Procedure Name : CHECK_VIRT_OPEN
 32147                                  ;
 32148                                  ; CHECK_VIRT_OPEN checks to see if we had performed a "virtual open" (by
 32149                                  ; examining the flag [VIRTUAL_OPEN] to see if it is 1). If we did, then
 32150                                  ; it calls Dev_Close_SFT to decrement the ref. count. It also resets the
 32151                                  ; flag [VIRTUAL_OPEN].
 32152                                  ; No registers affected (including flags).
 32153                                  ; On input, [THISSFT] points to current SFT.
 32154                                  ;
 32155                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32156                                  
 32157                                  CHECK_VIRT_OPEN:
 32158                                  	PUSH	AX
 32159                                  	lahf			; preserve flags
 32160                                  	CMP	byte [VIRTUAL_OPEN],0
 32161                                  	JZ	short ALL_CLOSED
 32162                                  	mov	byte [VIRTUAL_OPEN],0 ; reset flag
 32163                                  	push	es
 32164                                  	push	di
 32165                                  	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 32166                                  	call	DEV_CLOSE_SFT
 32167                                  	pop	di
 32168                                  	pop	es
 32169                                  
 32170                                  ALL_CLOSED:
 32171                                  	sahf			; restore flags
 32172                                  	POP	AX
 32173                                  	retn
 32174                                  
 32175                                  %endif

 32212                                  ; Procedure Name : FNDCLUS
 32213                                  ;
 32214                                  ; Inputs:

 32340                                          XCHG    BX,DI

 32344                                  %else

 32429                                  ;Break  <BUFSEC -- BUFFER A SECTOR AND SET UP A TRANSFER>
 32430                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32431                                  ;
 32432                                  ; Procedure Name : BUFSEC
 32433                                  ;
 32434                                  ; Inputs:
 32435                                  ;       AH = priority of buffer
 32436                                  ;       AL = 0 if buffer must be read, 1 if no pre-read needed
 32437                                  ;       ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 32438                                  ;       [CLUSNUM] = Physical cluster number
 32439                                  ;       [SECCLUSPOS] = Sector position of transfer within cluster
 32440                                  ;       [BYTCNT1] = Size of transfer
 32441                                  ; Function:
 32442                                  ;       Insure specified sector is in buffer, flushing buffer before
 32443                                  ;       read if necessary.
 32444                                  ; Outputs:
 32445                                  ;       ES:DI = Pointer to buffer
 32446                                  ;       SI = Pointer to transfer address
 32447                                  ;       CX = Number of bytes
 32448                                  ;       [NEXTADD] updated
 32449                                  ;       [TRANS] set to indicate a transfer will occur
 32450                                  ;       Carry set if error (user FAILed to I 24)
 32451                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32452                                  
 32453                                  	; 25/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 32454                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:98C2h
 32455                                  
 32456                                  	; (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8BF1h) - Retro DOS v4.0 (& v4.1)
 32457                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8C2Ch) - Retro DOS v4.2
 32458                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:0BE33h)
 32459                                  
 32460                                  BUFSEC:
 32461                                  	; 25/02/2024
 32462                                  	;;;
 32463                                  	;push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 32464 00005447 8B16[DE0A]              	mov	dx,[CLUSNUM_HW]
 32465                                  	;mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],dx
 32466 0000544B 8716[E80A]              	xchg	dx,[CLUSTNUM_HW]
 32467 0000544F 52                      	push	dx	; [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 32468                                  	;;;
 32469 00005450 8B16[BC05]                      MOV     DX,[CLUSNUM]
 32470 00005454 8A1E[7305]                      MOV     BL,[SECCLUSPOS]
 32471                                  	;mov	byte [ALLOWED],38h
 32472 00005458 C606[4B03]38                    MOV     byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY+Allowed_IGNORE
 32473 0000545D E89A01                          CALL    FIGREC
 32474 00005460 E81F11                  	call	GETBUFFR
 32475                                  	; 25/02/2024
 32476                                  	;;;
 32477 00005463 8F06[E80A]              	pop	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 32478                                  	;;;
 32479 00005467 72DD                            jc	short fndclus_retn
 32480                                  
 32481 00005469 C606[7405]01                    MOV     BYTE [TRANS],1	; A transfer is taking place
 32482 0000546E 8B36[B805]                      MOV     SI,[NEXTADD]
 32483 00005472 89F7                            MOV     DI,SI
 32484 00005474 8B0E[D205]                      MOV     CX,[BYTCNT1]
 32485 00005478 01CF                            ADD     DI,CX
 32486 0000547A 893E[B805]                      MOV     [NEXTADD],DI
 32487 0000547E C43E[E205]                      LES     DI,[CURBUF]
 32488                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],8
 32489 00005482 26804D0508                      OR      byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_isDATA
 32490                                  	;;;lea	di,[di+16] ; MSDOS 3.3 
 32491                                  	;;lea	di,[di+20] ; MSDOS 6.0
 32492                                          ;lea	di,[di+24] ; PCDOS 7.1  ; 25/02/2024
 32493 00005487 8D7D18                  	LEA     DI,[DI+BUFINSIZ]        ; Point to buffer
 32494 0000548A 033E[CC05]                      ADD     DI,[BYTSECPOS]
 32495 0000548E F8                              CLC	; (not necessary!?) ; 25/02/2024
 32496 0000548F C3                              retn
 32497                                  
 32498                                  ;Break   <BUFRD, BUFWRT -- PERFORM BUFFERED READ AND WRITE>
 32499                                  
 32500                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32501                                  ;
 32502                                  ; Procedure Name : BUFRD
 32503                                  ;
 32504                                  ; Do a partial sector read via one of the system buffers
 32505                                  ; ES:BP Points to DPB
 32506                                  ; Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 32507                                  ;
 32508                                  ; DS - set to DOSDATA
 32509                                  ;
 32510                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32511                                  
 32512                                  	; 25/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 32513                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 32514                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32515                                  BUFRD:
 32516 00005490 06                              PUSH	ES
 32517 00005491 31C0                            xor	ax,ax			; pre-read sector
 32518 00005493 E8B1FF                          CALL    BUFSEC
 32519 00005496 7303                            JNC	short BUF_OK ; ds=ss
 32520                                  
 32521                                  BUF_IO_FAIL:				; this label used by BUFWRT also
 32522 00005498 07                              POP	ES
 32523 00005499 EB2D                            JMP     SHORT RBUFPLACED ; ds=ss
 32524                                  
 32525                                  BUF_OK:
 32526 0000549B 8CC3                            MOV     BX,ES
 32527 0000549D 8E06[2E03]                      MOV     ES,[DMAADD+2]
 32528 000054A1 8EDB                            MOV     DS,BX
 32529 000054A3 87F7                    	XCHG    DI,SI
 32530 000054A5 D1E9                            SHR     CX,1
 32531                                  ;M039
 32532                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 32533                                  	;JNC	short EVENRD
 32534                                  	;MOVSB
 32535                                  ;EVENRD:
 32536                                  	;REP     MOVSW
 32537                                  
 32538                                  ;	CX = # of whole WORDs ; CF=1 if odd # of bytes.
 32539                                  ;       DS:SI-> Source within Buffer.
 32540                                  ;       ES:DI-> Destination within Transfer memory block.
 32541                                  
 32542                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 32543 000054A7 F3A5                    	rep	movsw			;Copy Buffer to Transfer memory.
 32544                                  	;adc	cx,0                    ;CX=1 if odd # of bytes, else CX=0.
 32545                                  	;rep	movsb                   ;Copy last byte.
 32546                                  	; 16/12/2022
 32547 000054A9 7301                    	jnc	short EVENRD ; **** 20/05/2019
 32548 000054AB A4                      	movsb ; ****
 32549                                  	; 25/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 32550                                  	;adc	cx,0
 32551                                  	;rep	movsb
 32552                                  ;M039
 32553                                  EVENRD: ; ****
 32554 000054AC 07                              POP	ES
 32555                                  ;hkn; SS override
 32556 000054AD 36C53E[E205]                    LDS     DI,[SS:CURBUF]
 32557                                  	;;;lea	bx,[di+16]
 32558                                  	;;lea	bx,[di+20] ; MSDOS 6.0
 32559                                  	;lea	bx,[di+24] ; PCDOS 7.1	; 25/02/2024
 32560 000054B2 8D5D18                  	LEA     BX,[DI+BUFINSIZ]
 32561 000054B5 29DE                            SUB     SI,BX                   ; Position in buffer
 32562 000054B7 E86A10                          call	PLACEBUF
 32563                                  	;cmp	si,[es:bp+2]
 32564 000054BA 263B7602                	CMP	SI,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE] ; Read Last byte?
 32565 000054BE 7205                            JB	short RBUFPLACEDC ; ds<>ss ; No, leave buf where it is
 32566                                  ;M039
 32567                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 32568                                  	;call	PLACEHEAD               ; Make it prime candidate for chucking
 32569                                                                          ;  even though it is MRU.
 32570                                          ; MSDOS 6.0
 32571 000054C0 36893E[6D00]            	MOV	[ss:BufferQueue],DI	; Make it prime candidate for
 32572                                  ;M039					; chucking even though it is MRU.
 32573                                  
 32574                                  RBUFPLACEDC:
 32575 000054C5 F8                              CLC
 32576                                  ;RBUFPLACED:
 32577 000054C6 16                      	push	ss
 32578 000054C7 1F                      	pop	ds
 32579                                  RBUFPLACED:	; 25/02/2024 (ds=ss)
 32580 000054C8 C3                              retn

 32585                                  ;

 32774                                  ;Break	<OPTIMIZE -- DO A USER DISK REQUEST WELL>
 32775                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32776                                  ;
 32777                                  ; Procedure Name : OPTIMIZE
 32778                                  ;
 32779                                  ; Inputs:
 32780                                  ;	  BX = Physical cluster
 32781                                  ;	  CX = No. of records
 32782                                  ;	  DL = sector within cluster
 32783                                  ;	  ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 32784                                  ;	  [NEXTADD] = transfer address
 32785                                  ; Outputs:
 32786                                  ;	  AX = No. of records remaining
 32787                                  ;	  BX = Transfer address
 32788                                  ;	  CX = No. or records to be transferred
 32789                                  ;	  DX = Physical sector address (LOW)
 32790                                  ;	  [HIGH_SECTOR] = Physical sector address (HIGH)
 32791                                  ;	  DI = Next cluster
 32792                                  ;	  [CLUSNUM] = Last cluster accessed
 32793                                  ;	  [NEXTADD] updated
 32794                                  ;	  Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 32795                                  ; ES:BP unchanged. Note that segment of transfer not set.
 32796                                  ;
 32797                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32798                                  
 32799                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 32800                                  	; 27/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 32801                                  
 32802                                  OPTIMIZE:
 32803 0000556B 52                      	PUSH	DX
 32804                                  	; 27/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 32805                                  	;;;
 32806 0000556C FF36[E80A]              	push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 32807                                  	;;;
 32808 00005570 53                      	PUSH	BX
 32809                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+4]
 32810 00005571 268A4604                	MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 32811 00005575 FEC0                    	INC	AL		; Number of sectors per cluster
 32812 00005577 88C4                    	MOV	AH,AL
 32813 00005579 28D0                    	SUB	AL,DL		; AL = Num of sectors left in first cluster
 32814 0000557B 89CA                    	MOV	DX,CX
 32815                                  	;MOV	CX,0
 32816                                  	; 25/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
